column2: [f2]I never believed it to be more than a legend...[~]A bedtime story someone concocted to fill the dreams of children.[/f]
[f2]But the Warriors of Light are real. One lives in me.[~]Shocking, and yet, this part of me has stirred before.[/f]
Heh. I must be more tired than I thought.[~]Far too much excitement all at once.
After all, she likes spending time with her subjects.[~]You were mistaken to search here.
